title: DishMatch â€” Replace gold accents with orange accent styling

requirements.summary: Replace current gold accent styling with an orange accent across the existing dark theme without changing layout/typography or adding features.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary/accent UI elements that currently render with the 'gold' accent (e.g., star ratings, filter sheet borders/buttons, badges) render with an orange accent instead.
No new UI features are introduced; only color styling changes.
All user-visible text remains in English (no new Japanese UI strings are added).

file_operations.description: Update the theme accent design tokens (e.g., --primary, --accent, --ring, related sidebar tokens) from the current gold values to an orange accent while keeping the rest of the dark theme tokens unchanged.

Replace gold-accent Tailwind utility usages (e.g., border-gold/bg-gold/text-gold/ring-gold) with accent-based equivalents (e.g., border-accent/bg-accent/text-accent/ring-accent) so header, banners, loading state, and footer reflect the orange accent without altering layout or copy.

Update the filter sheet styling to use the orange accent consistently by replacing gold-accent utility usages on borders, buttons, slider, and selection hover/focus states with accent-based equivalents; do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Replace gold-accent utilities in the ad placeholder (Sponsored pill, icon circles, heading) with accent-based equivalents so it renders with the orange accent.
Replace gold-accent utilities used for rating value text, category/price badges, and distance indicator styling with accent-based equivalents to match the new orange accent.

requirements.summary: Ensure the star rating component (including half-star gradient fill) uses the same orange accent consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: Filled stars and half-star gradient use the same orange accent color as the rest of the app.
Unfilled stars remain visually subdued on the dark background (no change in behavior, only consistent accent color).

file_operations.description: Update filled/half star styling to use the app accent color consistently (switch from gold-specific classes and var(--gold) gradient to accent-based classes and var(--accent)); keep unfilled stars subdued on the dark background and preserve current behavior.
